Reduced TUI doc size by trimming current docs and moving historical detail into archives so the module stays under the size threshold while keeping references intact. Updated the TUI sync and implementation docs to point to the new archives and recorded the change in the project SYNC. Commit: `Reduce TUI doc size via archiving`.

REPAIR COMPLETE

2) Re-run `ngram validate`.
